ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats,   +   1/2 cup pumpkin seeds,   +   1/2 cup walnuts,   +   1/2 cup pecans, 15  pitted Medjool dates,   +   1/2 cup brown rice syrup, 1 cup mini chocolate chips,   +   1/2 cup shredded coconut,   +   1/2 cup raisins,   +   1/4 cup sunflower seeds
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 6%, Saturated Fat 1g 7%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 11g 4%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 8g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 0mg 1%, Calcium 10mg 1%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 98mg 2%
